scripts.migrate_dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && cd ./backend && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.seed_dev_models: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && cd ./backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.undo_migrate_dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && cd ./backend && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.undo_seed_dev_models: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && cd ./backend && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all
scripts.setup_dev_db: yarn run migrate_dev && yarn run seed_dev_models
scripts.undo_setup_dev_db: yarn run undo_seed_dev_models && yarn run undo_migrate_dev
scripts.setup_prod_db: yarn run migrate_prod && yarn run seed_prod_models
scripts.undo_setup_prod_db: yarn run undo_seed_dev_models && yarn run undo_migrate_dev
